about_the_game:
Relive the best moments of 'There Is No Game: Wrong Dimension' with this amazing soundtrack composed by Xiaotian Shi.
Format: MP3 files only

Included : GiGi's song performed by Julie Shields (Music by Xiaotian Shi - Lyrics by Pascal Cammisotto)

Also contains a few bonus tracks (composed by Pascal Cammisotto) and the instrumental version of the songs!
